mapper.insert: insert into itachi_mb (mb_id, mb_pw, mb_name, mb_birth, mb_zip, mb_addr1, mb_addr2, mb_addr3, mb_hp, mb_email, mb_bank, mb_account) values (#{mb_Id}, #{mb_Pw}, #{mb_Name}, #{mb_Birth}, #{mb_Zip}, #{mb_Addr1}, #{mb_Addr2}, #{mb_Addr3}, #{mb_Hp}, #{mb_Email}, #{mb_Bank},#{mb_Account})
mapper.select: select mb_id from itachi_mb where mb_hp=#{mb_Hp} and mb_name=#{mb_Name} and mb_email=#{mb_Email}
select mb_id from itachi_mb where mb_id=#{mb_Id} and mb_birth=#{mb_Birth}
mapper.update: update itachi_mb set mb_pw=#{mb_Pw}, mb_name=#{mb_Name}, mb_zip=#{mb_Zip}, mb_addr1=#{mb_Addr1}, mb_addr2=#{mb_Addr2}, mb_addr3=#{mb_Addr3}, mb_email=#{mb_Email}, mb_bank=#{mb_Bank}, mb_account=#{mb_Account} where mb_id=#{mb_Id}
